name: Remembah
description:
Controls: 
Left-click for everything :)
Esc to quit

Options:
You can toggle SFX/Music/VFX in the ? or PAUSE menu.

How To Play:

  • Match cards to gain points
  • If you make an unsuccessful choice, it's your opponents turn, until they make an unsuccessful choice
  • When there are no cards left, the player with the most points wins
  • The opponents increase in difficulty, can you beat them all?
